CustomField.description: Report 'Due Date' translated to grantee language preference (based on Org record). Used in email templates.
CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(FundingAward.Awardee.Language_Preference__c)= "Kreyol",
Text(DAY(DATEVALUE(DueDate))) & " " & CASE(Text(MONTH(DATEVALUE(DueDate))),"1", "janvye", "2", "fevriye","3", "Mas","4", "Avril","5", "Me","6", "Jen", "7", "Jiyè", "8", "Out", "9", "Septanm", "10", "Oktòb", "11", "Novanm", "12", "Desanm", "")
& " " & TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(DueDate))),
IF(TEXT(FundingAward.Awardee.Language_Preference__c)= "French",
TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(DueDate))) & " " & CASE(Text(MONTH(DATEVALUE(DueDate))),"1", "janvier", "2", "février","3", "mars","4", "avril","5", "mai","6", "juin", "7", "juillet", "8", "août", "9", "septembre", "10", "octobre", "11", "november", "12", "décembre", "") & " " & TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(DueDate))),
IF(TEXT(FundingAward.Awardee.Language_Preference__c)= "Spanish",
TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(DueDate))) & " " & CASE(TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(DueDate))),"1", "enero", "2", "febrero","3", "marzo","4", "abril","5", "mayo","6", "junio", "7", "julio", "8", "agosto", "9", "septiembre", "10", "octubre", "11", "noviembre", "12", "diciembre", "") & " " & TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(DueDate))),"")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Report 'Due Date' translated to grantee language preference (based on Org record). Used in email templates.
CustomField.label: Due Date Translated
